mapper.select: with mainTopDestination as ( select td.travel_destination_id, td.name, td.address, td.img_url, count(fd.favorite_destination_id) as num_favorites, rank() over (order by count(fd.favorite_destination_id) desc) as rank from travel_destination td left join favorite_destination fd on td.travel_destination_id = fd.destination_id group by td.travel_destination_id, td.name, td.address, td.img_url ) select travel_destination_id, name, address, img_url, num_favorites, rank from mainTopDestination where rank <=9 order by rank, travel_destination_id fetch first 9 rows only
